issues: Some text may be difficult to read against the background color.
Minor adjustments may be needed for perfect alignment of text boxes.
Directional elements should be double-checked to ensure they guide the viewer effectively.
Some elements appear to have awkward gaps.

slides.summary: The slide is generally well-designed with a few areas for improvement in text visibility and spacing.
recommendations: Enhance the contrast of certain text areas to improve readability.
Review and adjust the spacing between elements for better visual balance.
